items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight floating clock for Mac users. Perfect for fullscreen or multi-desktop workflows—no need to move the cursor to the top menu bar. Add it as a Chrome extension, keep it always visible, draggable, and switch between analog or digital time easily.

items.title: Harsh-bharwani/AutoCorrect-Using-Trie-: A lightweight JavaScript-based autocorrect system that uses Trie and edit-distance logic to suggest correct words from a dictionary.

items.content_html: Laminar, is a full-featured team communication platform inspired by Slack, architected with a modern microservices approach. It enables teams to collaborate in real time through public/private channels, one-on-one messaging, threaded conversations, pinned messages, and lightweight voice/video huddles. All of this from scratch

It enables teams to collaborate in real time through public/private channels, one-on-one messaging, threaded conversations, pinned messages, and lightweight voice/video huddles. All of this from scratch

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible authentication library for Next.js that works seamlessly with both App Router and Pages Router. Provides simple email/password authentication with secure session management.

items.content_html: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)

items.content_html: Ollama Client – Chat with Local LLMs Inside Your Browser A lightweight, privacy-first Chrome extension to chat with locally hosted Ollama lllm models like LLaMA 2, Mistral, and CodeLLaMA. Supports streaming, stop/regenerate, markdown, and easy model switching — all without cloud APIs or data leaks.
items.title: Shishir435/ollama-client: Ollama Client – Chat with Local LLMs Inside Your Browser A lightweight, privacy-first Chrome extension to chat with locally hosted Ollama lllm models like LLaMA 2, Mistral, and CodeLLaMA. Supports streaming, stop/regenerate, markdown, and easy model switching — all without cloud APIs or data leaks.

items.content_html: A lightweight, educational implementation of a constant product market maker for the Stacks blockchain. Features liquidity pooling, token swapping, and standard AMM functionality with a 0.3% fee structure. Perfect for learning DeFi fundamentals on Stacks.

items.content_html: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
